<<<<<<< HEAD
Speculum crape-gownorum, or, An old looking-glass for the young academicks, new foyl'd with reflections on some of the late high-flown sermons : to which is added, An essay towards a sermon of the newest fashion / by a guide to the inferiour clergy. Phillips, John, 1631-1706. Defoe, Daniel, 1661?-1731.
The second edition corrected and enlarged.
[2], 34 p.
Printed for E. Rydal, London : 1682.
Wrongly ascribed to Daniel Defoe. An attack on the Tory clergy. Advertisement: p. 34. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

Phillips, John, 1631-1706. Defoe, Daniel, 1661?-1731.
The second edition corrected and enlarged.
[2], 34 p.
Printed for E. Rydal, London : 1682.
Wrongly ascribed to Daniel Defoe. An attack on the Tory clergy. Advertisement: p. 34. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
E. Rydal
